captions.text: [CHILD SINGING]
I am a child of God.
And he has sent me here.

Has given me an earthly home
with parents kind and dear.

Lead me, guide me,
walk beside me.
Help me find the way.

Teach me all that I must do
to live with him someday.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
I am a child of God.
And he has sent me here.

Has given me an earthly home
with parents kind and dear.

Lead me, guide me,
walk beside me.
Help me find the way.

Teach me all that I must do
to live with him someday.
I am a child of God.
And so my needs are great.

Help me to understand
his words before
it grows too late.

Lead me, guide me,
walk beside me.
Help me find the way.

Teach me all that I must do
to live with him someday.
I am a child of God.
I am a child of God.
I am a child of God.
I am a child of God.
[MUISC PLAYING]

title: I Am a Child of God

comments.text:
John 1:12-13, we become a Child of God when we receive His Son and are born 
of Him, meaning we become "born of God"..We are His creations until then 
and not His child. We must receive His Son first..Hope this makes sense. 
God Bless.﻿

comments.text:
Good Morning


Listen while you read!
I am a child of God,
And he has sent me here,
Has given me an earthly home
With parents kind and dear.

Lead me, guide me, walk beside me,
Help me find the way.
Teach me all that I must do
To live with Him someday

I am a child of God,
And so my needs are great;
Help me to understand His words
Before it grows too late.

Lead me, guide me, walk beside me,
Help me find the way.
Teach me all that I must do
To live with Him someday

I am a child of God
Rich blessings are in store
If I but learn to do His will
I’ll live with Him once more

Lead me, guide me, walk beside me,
Help me find the way.
Teach me all that I must do
To live with Him someday﻿

comments.text:
I am a child of God,
And he has sent me here,
Has given me an earthly home
With parents kind and dear.

Chorus
Lead me, guide me, walk beside me,
Help me find the way.
Teach me all that I must do
To live with him someday

I am a child of God,
And so my needs are great;
Help me to understand his words
Before it grows too late.


I am a child of God.
Rich blessings are in store;
If I but learn to do his will
I'll live with him once more.

These simple word have seen me thru some trying times
When my hour seems the darkest
and Loneliness surround me
I feel these simple word
I am a Child of God 
No greater or less than the stars
To know that I have a Family eternally
in each one of use

Cool
CE Mason ﻿
comments.author: C E Mason

comments.text:

comments.author: E. Manaligod

comments.text:
I absolutely love this song soooo much! I'm 17 years old, and about a year 
ago I came across this video by chance whilst on YouTube, and at that point 
I knew nothing about the church and the gospel at all... I come from an 
atheist household were religion just was not part of our lives, but when I 
came across this video I had so many questions and an urge from the depths 
of my heart to learn... Unfortunately due to my mothers beliefs I cannot 
attend church or be taught by missionaries until I leave home when I'm 18 
in August, and this breaks my heart, but this has not stopped me. I try to 
learn and live to the best of my ability through the gospel and our Saviour 
Jesus Christ and I pray to our Heavenly Father to guide me and help me to 
grow into the young women I hope to become and I pray for patience and 
strength over the coming months. I know that I am a child and daughter of 
God.. In the name of Jesus Christ, Amen. ❤﻿
comments.author: Daisymque

comments.text:
+Daisymque What a great testimony. I really do believe that wholesome music 
and song can connect you even deeper with Heavenly Father and the Holy 
Spirit. Keep up your strength my sister! Missionaries are amazing and your 
baptism will be nothing short of wonderful.

comments.text:
I came here from the shaytards channel , i didnt know about mormon until i 
saw their channel! I have christian parent and we go to church at 
christmas  and rememberance day - i go with school at easter and christmas. 
But i dont know how i think of it. I feel i offended my music teacher once 
when I said I didnt beilive in it and I didnt like a certain church to a 
friend one which hw was a leader of - I feel so bad about it and i always 
think og how bad i was. I dont think i belive the jesus story about god 
making Mary pregnant , I he was joseph and marys son but was told to have 
him was maybe when she became pregnent God decided this child shall be my 
speaker for example. But i do believe in God i think although I tell 
everyone i dont probably because of how i see the jesus story. But I 
believe in evolution and the big bang. So although I am kind of christian 
im not. I love this song as it holds my beilfs - I am a child of god as am 
one of his people in his planet that he sees or watches over but im my 
parents child more than his. But im not sure where im going with this 
comment but its nice to maybe tell someone. and if you got to here then 
whats baptisim?﻿
comments.author: Maisie Rhodes

comments.text:
Read this, Maisie:  https://www.lds.org/topics/baptism?lang=eng

It's what members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints 
(Mormons) believe about baptism.  Heavenly Father (God) loves us!  You, 
me...everyone (and you're right, He is watching over all of us).  His Son, 
Jesus Christ, loves each of us as well.  Baptism is one way you can show 
them that you love Them in return.  Keep asking questions!
comments.author: Whitney S

I do sing this song from  time to time

when we lose our way
and wonder, Then darkness fall's upon us
As i hear it in my heart
like a lamp, i can see
more clear the path before me
In peace I'll walk this path,There is no other way
For Brothers and Sister walk with me

In peace we truly can walk together
In love we will truly grow
We are Children
Just learning 
simple thing really﻿
